name: Everything is Fine (Dreamtale Games)
description:
Everything is Fine is an interactive story that uses its game mechanics only to tell you about the consequences of alcohol addiction and the connections that can push someone to fight it. 

You will see the unstable life of a divorced man with an addiction: watch the difficulties caused by his condition and help him with everyday things, acquiring new forms for him.

Game features: 

- Intense atmosphere; 

- Meditative gameplay; 

- Interactive storytelling through game mechanics, visual and sound; 

- Original soundtrack; 

- Visual style inspired by pencil drawing. 

How to play:

- Point & Click plus Drag & Drop. Interact with the environment and objects. Mouse control. 

DISCLAIMER 

Alcohol consumption is injurious to health. This videogame does not advertise any alcohol product or use of it. If you are struggling with addiction, contact your therapist.
